name: adygcode/base-blade-kit
description: A Laravel Blade Template with Sanctum Authentication built in

dev: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "npm run dev" --names='server,queue,vite'
dev-win: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fb7185,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "npm run dev"  "mailpit --smtp=0.0.0.0:2525" --names=server,queue,vite,mailpit
dev-linux: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fb7185,#fdba74,#74fdc5" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "php artisan pail --timeout=0" "npm run dev" "mailpit --smtp=0.0.0.0:2525" --names=server,queue,logs,vite,mailpit

scripts-descriptions.dev: Run Dev Env: omits Laravel Pail, MailPit
scripts-descriptions.dev-win: Run Dev Env: omits Laravel Pail.
scripts-descriptions.dev-linux: Run Dev Env: includes MailPit, Laravel Pail.
scripts-descriptions.phpstan: Run PHPStan static analysis against your application.
scripts-descriptions.post-autoload-dump: Executes automatically after a composer dump-autoload
scripts-descriptions.post-update-cmd: Executes automatically after a composer update
scripts-descriptions.post-root-package-install: Executes automatically ONLY main laravel package installation
scripts-descriptions.post-create-project-cmd: Executes automatically ONLY after initial create project
